title: New & Video: Jonti – Saturday Night
content:
Jonti, right smack in the middle of his much publicised tour with Gotye, has released a brand new cut,”Saturday Night“, a new recording of Jonti‘s demo track from Sine & Moon, his album of 4-track demos. And what a marvel it is, composed, remarkably honest and produced to a minute degree of perfection, it’s perhaps the ‘play me out’ lullaby the summer was always waiting for.

Video by Eric Coleman.

Download MP3 | Jonti – Saturday Night
